content.title: Study abroad partnerships | SOAS
content.description: SOAS is in partnership with a select number of universities worldwide for our students to study abroad as part of their degree

O u r g l o b a l p a r t n e r s SOAS holds partnerships with a number of universities across the world, allowing SOAS students to study abroad as part of their degree. (Subject to change and space limitations) China Open ( LLB with Year Abroad ) India Open ( LLB with Year Abroad ) Japan Open (women only) (priority forLinguistics translation pathway students) Jordan Open in Amman, Jordan Kenya Open Korea Open Norway Open ( LLB with Year Abroad ) Palestine Open Singapore Open ( LLB with Year Abroad ) Thailand Open ( LLB with Year Abroad ) Zanzibar Open R e l a t e d c o n t e n t Who can study abroad?
